name: Supernamer
body:
### supernamer v0.1 released!
The very first version of supernamer has been released. Beware of Dragons (and probably Wurms).

See the current known issues and in progress lists on the main project page: `https://github.com/superlinkx/supernamer`

Download v0.1 here: `downloads/v0.1/sn.py`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
